Uses of Interface
net.jxta.content.ContentTransfer

Packages that use ContentTransfer
net.jxta.content Content objects are container objects that can hold arbitrary data and are associated with a JXTA ID (replacing the older Codat API). 
net.jxta.impl.content   
net.jxta.impl.content.defprovider Implementation of the ContentProviderSPI which uses a custom, lightweight, easy to implement, but relatively slow protocol to transfer Content. 
net.jxta.impl.content.srdisocket Implementation of the ContentProviderSPI which uses the JxtaSocket API to provide Content transfer capabilities. 
 

Uses of ContentTransfer in net.jxta.content
 

Subinterfaces of ContentTransfer in net.jxta.content
 interface ContentTransferAggregator
          This interface represents a content transfer which is acting as a front for multiple ContentTransfer instances, all of which are working to obtain a single Content instance.
 

Classes in net.jxta.content that implement ContentTransfer
 class NullContentTransfer
          This class wraps an existing Content in an ContentTransfer object.
 

Methods in net.jxta.content that return ContentTransfer
 ContentTransfer ContentTransferEvent.getContentTransfer()
          Get the ContentTransfer which produced this event.
 ContentTransfer ContentTransferAggregator.getCurrentContentTransfer()
          Returns the currently selected/active ContentTransfer instance being actively used to retrieve the Content.
 ContentTransfer ContentTransferAggregatorEvent.getDelegateContentTransfer()
          Get the ContentTransfer which the aggregator is working with.
 ContentTransfer ContentProvider.retrieveContent(ContentID contentID)
          Retrieve the advertised Content if the provider supports automatic (or implicit) discovery of remote shares.
 ContentTransfer ContentProvider.retrieveContent(ContentShareAdvertisement adv)
          Retrieve the advertised Content if the share advertisement can be understood or (optionally) if the ContentAdvertisement embedded in the share advertisement can be used to automatically discover remote shares.
 

Methods in net.jxta.content that return types with arguments of type ContentTransfer
 List<ContentTransfer> ContentTransferAggregator.getContentTransferList()
          Returns the current list ContentTransfer instances being managed by the aggregated transfer object.
 

Methods in net.jxta.content with parameters of type ContentTransfer
 ContentTransferAggregatorEvent.Builder ContentTransferAggregatorEvent.Builder.contentTransfer(ContentTransfer value)
          Sets the ContentTransfer which is the subject of the event.
 

Constructors in net.jxta.content with parameters of type ContentTransfer
ContentTransferEvent.Builder(ContentTransfer source)
          Creates a new builder instance.
 

Uses of ContentTransfer in net.jxta.impl.content
 

Classes in net.jxta.impl.content that implement ContentTransfer
 class AbstractContentTransfer
          Abstract implementation of a ContentProvider, providing the basic infrastructure for locating the desired quantity of remote advertisements, notifying listeners of location state changes, and basic infrastrucure around transfer attempts.
 class TransferAggregator
          Provides multi-provider content transfer capabilities.
 

Methods in net.jxta.impl.content that return ContentTransfer
 ContentTransfer TransferAggregator.getCurrentContentTransfer()
          Returns the currently selected/active ContentTransfer instance being actively used to retrieve the Content.
 ContentTransfer ContentServiceImpl.retrieveContent(ContentID contentID)
          Retrieve the advertised Content if the provider supports automatic (or implicit) discovery of remote shares.
 ContentTransfer ContentServiceImpl.retrieveContent(ContentShareAdvertisement adv)
          Retrieve the advertised Content if the share advertisement can be understood or (optionally) if the ContentAdvertisement embedded in the share advertisement can be used to automatically discover remote shares.
 

Methods in net.jxta.impl.content that return types with arguments of type ContentTransfer
 List<ContentTransfer> TransferAggregator.getContentTransferList()
          Returns the current list ContentTransfer instances being managed by the aggregated transfer object.
 

Constructor parameters in net.jxta.impl.content with type arguments of type ContentTransfer
TransferAggregator(ContentProvider origin, List<ContentTransfer> transfers)
          Alternate form where the ContentTransfer instances have already been obtained and put into the desired attempt order.

Uses of ContentTransfer in net.jxta.impl.content.srdisocket
 

Classes in net.jxta.impl.content.srdisocket that implement ContentTransfer
 class SRDISocketContentTransfer
          Default implementation of a Content transfer mechanism, utilizing SRDI advertisements and JxtaSocket-based communications.
 

Methods in net.jxta.impl.content.srdisocket that return ContentTransfer

          Retrieve the advertised Content if the provider supports automatic (or implicit) discovery of remote shares.

          Retrieve the advertised Content if the share advertisement can be understood or (optionally) if the ContentAdvertisement embedded in the share advertisement can be used to automatically discover remote shares.
